short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gives you a button to save your system resources by replacing open tabs with placeholders.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Tab Unloader gives you a simple button to unload the current tab, or all tabs. You might do this in order to save on system resources (RAM, CPU), or to make the tab quiet.  Reload the tab just by clicking in its content area.
